boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; GAME SYSTEM_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; This entry is to allow for discussion/rating of the game system as a whole. It is not for a specific product or release. Versions will appear on the individual item pages._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; From the official website: In the Magic game, you play the role of a planeswalker_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;a powerful wizard who fights other planeswalkers for glory, knowledge, and conquest. Your deck of cards represents all the weapons in your arsenal. It contains the spells you know and the creatures you can summon to fight for you._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is the grandfather of the collectible card game (or CCG) genre. Cards are categorized as common, uncommon, rare, and mythic rare. Players collect cards and build decks out of their collection._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players build a deck of cards and duel against an opponent's deck. Players are wizards attempting to reduce their opponent's life total to zero. The first player to reduce his opponent's life to zero (or meet another set win condition) wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;An important part of the game is deck construction, which is done prior to the actual game by selecting what cards are included in a particular deck. There are nearly 20,000 different cards from which to build your deck!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Cards can be lands, which usually generate mana of various colors, or spells, which require a certain amount of mana to be used. Some cards (creatures, artifacts, and enchantments) stay on the board and continue to affect the game, while others have a one-time effect._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players randomly draw spells to see what they get and can play each turn. Although this limits your choices, there is a lot of strategy in how you play those spells. A robust list of game mechanics, including intricate rules for reactive card play called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;the stack,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; provide for rich tactics and tough choices each turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Though traditionally a two-player duel, there are several casual and tournament formats to Magic that allow more players to play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is sort of get a taste of Magic set and would be great for a those thinking about dabbling in the game a bit. The cards have been played once or never (I was strictly a limited player). This will be a priority mail flat rate box full of cards from various Magic blocks from Invasion until Ravnica block. there are a total of 1,686 non basic land cards in this set, with very few duplicates (you can assess the number of duplicates below). In a couple cases there is a complete set of commons or close to a complete set of commons from a particular expansion. Below I list the cards by set and rarity. Please note, I do believe think there are any high value rares in this collection, although a couple low and medium value rares. I can provide a more thorough listing of the rares upon request. Set, Commons/uncommons/rares Invasion, 95/67/6 also 20 basic land Planeshift, 49/27/4 Planshift, an additional 25 duplicate commons Apocalypse, 52/40/5 Apocalypse, an additional 47 duplicate commons Oddyssey 103/78/13, also 20 basic land Torment, 52/31/7 Judgment, 53/21/0 Onslaught, 110/36/10 Onslaught, an additional 109 duplicate commons Legions, 52/29/5 Scourge, 55/28/2 Champions, 108/51/9 Champions, an additional 96 duplicate commons Betrayers, 51/0/2 Saviors, 0/43/1 Ravnica, 58/0/10 Ravnica, an additional 33 duplicate commons Guildpact, 44/8/5 Dissension, 53/36/5 6th, 66/8/0 There are 1,686 total nonland cards in this lot, 40 basic land and I can include another 200 basic land if you should need them. There are 1001 unique commons from across all these blocks plus another 343 duplicate commons, 504 unique uncommons, and 84 unique rares. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m including 13 foils (including 2 rare foils). Please contact me if more detail is needed. I can provide a more thorough listing of the rares (although Shipping will be $10.

I am selling my entire collection of 1000+ cards. Most are from Unlimited, 3rd edition, Legends, and the early expansions, but there is a smattering of cards across all the sets from 1995-2000. Plenty of uncommons and rares. I mostly collected blue and green but there is great stuff there for all colors. This is an early collection of MTG in great condition. Most cards have never been played, and the majority are in NM condition. There are a few individual cards that have minor scuffing or damage on the front, but are still very playable. I have cataloged all the sets, and listed out every single uncommon and rare, so you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll know precisely what you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re getting! I will be happy to send this list to you, just e-mail me. None of this _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Trust me, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a great set of cards,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll know exactly what_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in store. I was able to have a killer blue denial/control deck and a green weenie rush deck with this set, that both held up against modern decks quite well. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be happy to send details of the decks I put together, but really, isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t most of the fun figuring it out for yourself? Some highlights: 4x Counterspell 4x Control Magic 2x Mahamoti Djinn Steal Artifact Devastation Reverberation Elvish Archers Drain Power Lots of Legends, including Invoke Prejudice $120 is just my rough starting price, please feel free to make me a lower offer. Buyer pays actual shipping.

Magic The Gathering 9th Edition Core Game Two-Player Starter Set (2005) from Wizards of the Coast Box: Light shelf-wear and a few dings, dents and wrinkles. There is a plastic display-hanger attached to the back and the flap where the box opens doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t close very well, so I have taped it close. Contents: Brand New and unplayed! You get 2 sealed decks, one for each player, a sealed 14-card expansion pack, a sealed Serra Angel premium card, 2 Play Guides, Rulebook, 2 playmats with scorekeeping counters, a CD-ROM with step-by-step directions and a computerized version of the game, as well as a trial sign-up for the Magic Online game (with a credit for all online versions of the cards that come with the game). SHIPPING U.S. shipping will be via USPS Priority Shipping and based on a weight of 2 Lbs. International buyers are very welcome, but please contact me for a shipping price quote to avoid any surprises or misunderstandings. I will gladly combine shipping for multiple purchases. The final cost will be based on the total weight, but be aware that large packages that are shipped more than a certain distance accrue a large surcharge, so combining shipping may not save any money.

This is one large lot - approximately 800 cards. The quality of the cards ranges from Good on most of the older ones to Near Mint-Unplayed on the newest cards. Most are in the Very Good-Excellent range. There are not a whole lot of 4-ofs. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not looking to trade/sell individual cards, only the whole lot. The lot consists mostly of Commons and Uncommons. There are approximately 50 Rare cards. Mainly cards from the following blocks: (approximate counts) Kamigawa(60) -- Ravnica(220) -- TimeSpiral(170) -- Lorwyn(25) X(25) There also (260) cards from several older blocks. (150) lands, including (36) Specialty, or dual lands. (42) Artifacts, (100) Multi-color This lot also includes 1 partial, and 2 nearly complete home-brew decks that aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t part of the above count.
